---
category: news
title: "Global Flip Chip Technology Market Set for Rapid Growth, Forecast by 2025"
excerpt: "The flip chip technology market was valued at USD 23.95 billion in 2019 and is expected to reach a value of USD 33.71 billion by 2025, at a CAGR of 5.74%, over the forecast period (2020 - 2025). Fan-Out wafer-level packaging and Embedded die are some of the fastest emerging technologies in the market."
